strong.span: Please check our Community Page for Up-To-Date information on the
District's Response to COVID-19 and Idaho Elections.

br.p: One of the pieces of Idaho's new school accountability system is a parent survey. This survey asks for your input on several topics to help measure how our schools are doing in meeting your needs.
The School Board meeting for March has been moved to March 10, 2020.
An audit was prepared by Musgrave Engineering, P.A. in association with Idaho Power.
